IV.i.2.A.6.b
.
Who May Request Other Types of Specialist Examinations
In certain circumstances, specialist examinations for other conditions can be requested by
the
development or rating activity
the medical examiner, or
BVA.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A - Examination Requests Overview
citation: Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A
